name: Parcel Panic 2 - Post Car Racing
description:
If you like this game, please check out our new title Uber Racer 3D Monster Truck Nightmare!

From the creators of Parcel Panic and Uber Racer
Deliver your parcels before your gas runs out! Discover shortcuts and don't lose your boxes!

Parcel Panic is back! We took all that made Parcel Panic great, completely overhauled and extended it into the most awesome experience you have seen - and we even added chickens!

Deliver your parcels before your gas runs out - simple as that!
But stop, there is a little twist to it: The huge beautiful landscape is full of corners, turns and shortcuts waiting to be mastered by you! Skill, cleverness and a good delivery truck will be the weapons in your arsenal!

Find your way through the huge island, collect coins and gems to buy upgrades and unlock new cars!

With specific optimizations for new devices, this game squeezes every bit of performance out of your device! Runs great on older iPhones / iPods / iPads touch, too!

FEATURES

- Unique combination of racing and skill game
- Large Open World: Drive where you want to! No restrictions!
- Beautiful graphics with lots and lots of detail - and extra love
- Great physics engine
- Cow tipping - now even better thanks to world-leading cow tipping simulation engine (ctse)
- 3d positional audio - enjoy with headphones for maximum pleasure!
- Eight awesome trucks to choose from, more with every update
- Autodetects your iPod/iPad/iPhone to enable even higher detail on the newest devices
- No pay to win: We believe in good games - You can play all of the game by unlocking it yourself
- Improve your truck with individual upgrades
- Runs very well on older devices
